Home.title: Envirotechnical - Fight climate change in tech
Home.description: envirotechnical is a climate change fight project by 404answernotfound, first presented at Codemotion Milan 2022 by Lorenzo Pieri

Alert.alertText: Interested in adding your website or research to this page?

CTA.cta_title: Join the fight against Climate Change
CTA.cta_description: There are many amazing opportunities to sponsor incredible no profits around the world. If you have the chance to give something, why not reach out to them? Are you a no profit organization that would like to be listed on this website? Just send a message to 404answernotfound.public@gmail.com or contact me directly on LinkedIn or Twitter!

Hero.description: Let's fight climate change one byte at a time :)

List.title: Resources for a sustainable web
List.description: Get started on sustainable web development and design with our resources and get a glance at how even the smallest commitment can have a solid take into the fight to climate change.

Footer.cta: The time to act is now
Footer.cta_question: Interested in showcasing a research, article or video about the subject?
